== CW Mode Bandplan ==

License Privileges are listed first with the Bandplan following.
CW is permitted in all bands in the US except 60m. But there is some areas where a designated portion is CW only.
CW is also permitted in the same frequenices as data modes, you should notice that some entries below are identical to the digital band plan.
Listed by country as plans may change in your area depending on propagation.
Please post any differences.
